1. Which point on the Tchebichev Mechanism moves in approximate straight line?
() End-point of shortest link () Mid-point of longest link () None of these (x) Mid-point of shortest link
2. Watt's linkage draws
() Perfect Straight Line () Circle (x) Approximate Straight Line () None of these
3. If the shortest link is 10cm in Tchebichev Mechanism, what is the length of longest link?
() 20cm (x) 25cm () 15cm () 30cm
4. Grashof's condition is the necessary condition for?
(x) Continuous motion () Intermittent motion () Non Continuous motion () None of these
5. The ratio of links in Tchebichev Mechanism (Shortest:Fixed:RemainingTwo) is ?
(x) 1:2:2.5 () 1:2.5:2 () 1:4:2 () 1:2:4
